Rule: Higher education (Masters, Doctorate, Bachelors, Prof-school) leads to higher income.
Sales, Professional, and White-Collar occupations lead to higher income.
Gender being Male leads to higher income.
Marital Status: Being married or widowed leads to a higher income compared to being single.
Work Hours: Flexibility in working hours can still lead to a higher income.
Workclass: Being self-employed or having flexibility in the work environment can lead to higher income.
